string.name: intro_answer
string.ul:
•
For the past 2 months and a half, I have been given the opportunity to be a part of the POS team and get a first look at our the new system for Taco Bell.
 
•
I have had the opportunity to learn about Android, Git, Kotlin and much more!
 
•
I want to introduce and teach you all quickly about all the things Ive learned so far.

string.name: self_intro_answer
string.ul:
•
I attend the University of Wisconsin-Madison.

I will be going into my senior year, graduating Fall 2022.
 
•
I study computer Engineering and Computer Science.
 
•
I live in Chicago!
 
•
I love to go the gym, play on a Esports Team for a video game called Valorant and love to play guitar here and there!

string.name: android_a_one
string.ul:
•
An operation system that lets a device and an end user to be able to interact with one another
 
•
In case you did not know, an operating system is computer software that works to integrate hardware and software resources
 
•
Last bullet

resources.string: What can we build with android?

string.name: android_a_two
string.ul:
•
Billions of devices around the world are being powered by Android, from smartphones, watches, tablets and more!
 
•
Other bullet
 
•
Last bullet

resources.string: How to get started on android!

string.name: android_a_three
string.ul:
•
You can get started on using the Android OS by installing Android Studio, an IDE that allows you to use kotlin to code and use android.
 
•
Other bullet
 
•
Last bullet
